about_the_game:
Bank It! is an exciting dice game of strategy and risk, where players take turns rolling dice to build up points in a shared pot. The challenge? Anyone can claim these points at any time by calling "BANK!" – but wait too long, and you might lose everything!

Bank It! - Game Instructions:

Basic Concepts

  • The Pot: A running total of points accumulated during each roll

  • Banking: Claiming the current pot value for your personal score

  • Round End: Occurs when either someone rolls a 7 or all players have banked

  • The pot starts at 0 points at the beginning of each round

  • After 10 rounds, the player with the highest total score wins

First Three Rolls

  • Rolling a 7: Award 70 points to the pot (instead of ending the round)

  • Rolling Doubles: Add face value only (example: two 4s = 8 points)

  • All other rolls: Add the sum to the pot

Fourth Roll Onward

  • Rolling a 7: Round immediately ends (all unbanked points are lost)

  • Rolling Doubles: Double the entire pot

  • All other rolls: Add the sum to the pot

Banking Rules

  • Any player can "BANK!" at any time to claim the current pot value

  • Banking can occur before or after any roll, regardless of whose turn it is

  • Once you bank:

    • The points are permanently added to your score

    • You cannot roll anymore this round

    • You cannot bank again this round

  • Multiple players can bank the same pot value

  • If you don't bank before the round ends, you get zero points for that round

Remember:The key to winning is finding the perfect balance between greed and caution. GLHF!

short_description: Push your luck in this fast-paced 3D dice game where fortune favors the bold... but greed comes at a price! Roll the dice, build the pot, and race to call "BANK!" before the unlucky friend rolls a 7.
